qas.question: Smart Bodies is an example of an initiative that was started by what level of government?
What is the goal of Smart Bodies?
The Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Louisiana Foundation joined together with which University to help develop Smart Bodies?
When was the Smart Bodies initiative first released?
What does the initiative specifically target?

context: An example of a <a0_0>state<a0_0/> initiative <a1_0>to promote nutrition literacy<a1_0/> is Smart Bodies, a public-private partnership between the state’s largest university system and largest health insurer, <a2_0>Louisiana State Agricultural Center<a2_0/> and Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Louisiana Foundation. Launched in <a3_0>2005<a3_0/>, this program promotes lifelong healthful eating patterns and physically active lifestyles for children and their families. It is an interactive educational program designed to help prevent <a4_0>childhood obesity<a4_0/> through classroom activities that teach children healthful eating habits and physical exercise.
